subject: Investing
title: Common Crypto Scams to Avoid
description: One-minute skill: Common Crypto Scams to Avoid.

hook.text: Crypto scams stole over $14 billion in 2021 alone. Most victims clicked one wrong link.

buildup.text: Phishing sites mimic legitimate exchanges. Rug pulls drain liquidity pools. Ponzi schemes promise fake yields.

discovery.text: The common thread: urgency, secrecy, and promises of guaranteed returns. Real investments never guarantee returns.

twist.text: Even experienced investors fall for sophisticated scams. The technology is new, but the tricks are ancient.

climax.text: Verify URLs, never share seed phrases, and remember: if it sounds too good to be true, it is.

punchline.text: In crypto, trust the code‚Äîbut verify everything else twice.

quiz.question: What is a rug pull in crypto?
options: Developers draining liquidity and abandoning a project
